titleStmt.title: To WILLIAM JERDAN,William Jerdan (1782-1869; Dictionary of National Biography), editor of the Literary Gazette 1817-50; from 1820 a leading figure in literary society: see Pilgrim Letters 1, p. 207n; also Jerdan’s Autobiography (4 vols, 1852-3). Period: 2 JUNE 1843

body.p: Many thanks for your kind remembrance of me. I tried hard, but I couldn’t come; being engaged that day, four times.
